title: shivanAr naTanam kaNDEn
sahitya:
shivanAr naTanam kaNDEn tillaip-padiyil ADum


anupallavi

  inren mana mEDai mIdinilE vegu perindE
manam ugandE magizvoDu pal vidamAga ADum


caraNam    ellaiyilA vELai tanilE avanaik-kANugaiyil valvinaiyO tuyarO
enai aNugumO avan arum padam ninandurugum vELaiyilE
